Product Description



The Amazon rainforest has attracted both explores and exploiters for centuries. The lure of this region is created in part by the Amazon River, which is the longest river in the world. Many come for the more than two million forms of life - one-half of the living species on earth!

The Amazon Trail lets you explore this region while pursuing a life-saving mission. Your goal is to find a medicinal plant that will save the ancient Incas from malaria, and deliver the medicine to the Inca King. As you travel, you will also meet and learn about fascinating people, including indigenous people and historical figures.

Educational Benefits:

Discover the history band ecology of the Amazon Navigate the Amazon&#039;s complex geography Uncover the secrets of South America and the Ancient Incas Develop problem-solving skills Microsoft Windows 3.1 Operating System
